title: 2025 IRGC40 Electric Tricycle in Red (Non-Assembled)
item_description:
2025 IRGC40 Electric Tricycle in Red (Non-Assembled)

  • Condition: Unused Non-Assembled
  • Make: IR
  • Model: IRGC40
  • Color: Red
  • Year: 2025
  • LED smart operation screen
  • Three speed
  • Flexible and versatile foldable and storable second row seats
  • 600W motor
  • 60V 20A long-life battery
  • Non-Assembled

    • Length: 72”
    • Height: 45.5”
  • Photos are representative of this item. The first photo in the gallery shows the color this unit will come in. The last photos in the gallery shows this unit in the condition the buyer will receive it. This unit is being sold as a non-assembled unit. The images in the gallery are for illustration purposes only.
